title: 72: A Source Shares What Is On Paul's Cell & A Legal Breakdown of The Case So Far
description:
Reporter, John Monk, reveals what his source tells him what they saw on Paul Murdaugh's camera from the night of the murders.
Dick Harpootlian subpoenas SLED over leaks.
Our legal analyst, John Snyder, breaks down what has been going on in this case and what may come next.
Cousin Eddie is transferred from Alex Murdaugh's jail.
We learn Alex , allegedly, stole a whole lot of money from his brother.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
